title: Breville -- The Thinking Behind the Variable Temperature Kettle
description:
Breville Variable Temperature Electric Kettle - BKE820XL

Faster than the stovetop, and easier too, this electric kettle from Breville boils with the best of them. Elegantly styled in gleaming stainless steel, you can choose from five preset temperatures for precision boiling and perfectly prepared drinks.

asset.title: Breville -- The Thinking Behind the Variable Temperature Kettle
asset.description:
For more about Breville products visit: www.brevilleusa.com

Breville's principal designers, Keith Hensel and Richard Hoare, talk about their motivations behind designing the Variable Temperature Kettle.
